korean: 사람 많은 곳은 좀 피곤하지만 오랜만이라 가기로 했어.
한 20명 정도 온다고 해서 규모가 꽤 크네.
너무 격식 차린 옷은 부담스럽고 그렇다고 너무 편한 옷도 애매해.
와인이 무난할 것 같은데 뭘 사야 할지 모르겠어.
친구한테 물어볼까 했는데 그냥 서프라이즈로 가져가자.
파티 가는 게 오랜만이라 좀 설레기도 하고 긴장도 돼.
새로운 사람들도 만날 수 있을 것 같아.
english: I got invited to a party this weekend by a friend.
They said it's going to be at their place.
Crowded places are kind of tiring, but I decided to go since it's been a while.
About 20 people are coming, so it's pretty big.
I'm already worried about what to wear.
Too formal clothing feels burdensome, but too casual is also awkward.
I should wear something reasonably neat.
I should also prepare a gift to bring.
Wine seems safe, but I don't know what to buy.
I thought about asking my friend, but let's just bring it as a surprise.
It's been a while since I've gone to a party, so I'm both excited and nervous.
I think I'll be able to meet new people.
I wish the weekend would come quickly.
I should go and have fun.
